VimTeX Cheat Sheet

Commands

:VimtexInfo show info about current project
:VimtexTocOpen show table of contents window
:VimtexTocToggle toggle table of contents window
:VimtexCompile start compiler in continuous mode
:VimtexStop abort compilation
:VimtexClean delete auxiliary files

Normal Mode

cse change an environment
dse delete an environment
tse toggle starred environment
vie select inside of environment
vae select inside of environment, including environment tags
[[ move to beginning of previous section
]] move to beginning of next section
[] move to end of previous section
][ move to end of next section
[m move to beginning of previous environment
]m move to beginning of next environment
[M move to end of previous environment
]M move to end of next environment

Insert Mode

]] close environment

Visual Mode
